hero.title: Share Your Extraordinary Experiences
hero.subtitle: Connect with others who have experienced the unexplained. Share paranormal events, UFO sightings, synchronicities, and more.

features.title: Explore & Connect
features.subtitle: A platform designed for extraordinary experiences

share.title: Share Experiences
share.description: Tell your story through text, voice, photos, or sketches with our intelligent 4-step submission flow and AI assistance

discover.title: Discover Patterns
discover.description: Find connections with similar experiences worldwide using our advanced AI-powered pattern matching algorithm

community.title: Join Community
community.description: Connect with others who've had similar encounters. Earn XP, unlock badges, and level up as you contribute

cta.title: Ready to Share Your Story?
cta.subtitle: Join our community and help map the unexplained. Earn rewards, unlock badges, and connect with others.

search.title: Search Experiences
search.subtitle: AI-powered search with automatic intent detection

askMode: Ask questions about patterns in experiences
